turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey! I'm dying for some caffeine right now can you order me something from Peets for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes! I love Peets. What do you want from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm carving a latter, do they have any special ones on the menu?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's a Cold Brew Fog Latte or Coconut Cold Brew Fog Latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's the difference between the two of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The coconut cold brew fog latter is a tad creamier, milder coffee taste with a hint of coconut. I really think you would like that one!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't really like coconut too much so lets get the regular one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a large, I think I'm going to need one to get through the day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome, I know you are vegan so do you want me to substitute the milk for almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, always almond milk. I hate the taste of soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add a few Splenda to it because I like everything super sweet. No whip or anything fancy like that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect, what's the best pick up location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the one by the Whole Foods in San Diego.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. The address there is 350 University Avenue, Suite D San Diego, CA 92103

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So one large Cold Brew Fog Latte with almond milk and three Splenda for pick up at the 350 University Avenue in San Diego? Is that all right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is all set and will be ready for pick up in 10 minutes at the Hillcrest Peets Coffee in San Diego. I also just sent you the receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You really are the best!!
